meanings.sent1: The acyclic pattern of the necklace made it easy to untangle.
meanings.sent2: The acyclic road led straight to the town without any loops.
meanings.sent3: The acyclic relationship between the two friends meant they never fought over who called first.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed acyclically, never returning to the same idea twice.
meanings.sent5: The acyclic design of the garden maze confused the visitors, who couldn't find their way out.

meanings.sent1: The acyclic weather pattern brought continuous rain for days.
meanings.sent2: His acyclic work schedule changed every week, never following a set pattern.
meanings.sent3: The acyclic behavior of the cat kept its owner guessing about its next move.
meanings.sent4: The acyclic melody of the song kept listeners intrigued, never repeating the same tune.
meanings.sent5: The acyclic growth of the plant surprised botanists, as it didn't follow the usual seasonal cycle.
